html:
5.6.24  1:27 am   can you describe how it felt to get the song book organized in 2012?

      very good. it's like all those people you see on here sometimes, talking about how their ideas are so scattered and they don't know how to even count them or sort them or where they all are .... imagine what it feels like to 'find a cure' for that

5.5.24  10:47 pm   i know the things i want to do, but before i can do them, it seems i have to spend time trying and failing to do them, i think it's what people call learning. i don't like that part. Can i skip it? if not, how can i make myself like it?

      wouldn't it be a lot of fun to come up with 10 wrong ways to do all these things

5.5.24  10:46 pm   do you agree that the welsh country will now be officially referred to as welgium

      no, but sometimes i refer to belgium as scotland. i know that's off the subject

5.5.24  10:24 pm   at what point is it okay to quit?

      at the end

5.5.24  10:06 pm   How big do you think your biggest fan is? 

      huge

5.5.24  8:48 pm   how do you prefer your ceiling at night?

      really good

5.5.24  6:19 pm   What exactly are your thoughts

      qwertyuiopasdfghjklzxcvbnm

5.5.24  5:53 pm   how do i get myself worked up so that i can start my day. it's 5pm and i've been awake since 7am but i have not quite started the day yet. this is a colossal waste of time

      what happens is, your frustration with yourself will increase day by day and build to a peak. one day you will be so desperate to correct this that you'll wake up and accomplish a lot. then of course you will do much less the next day because your frustration has been temporarily cured due to the extra work the other day

5.5.24  3:20 pm   What's the best thing to think about?

      when

5.5.24  2:49 pm   you ever just think

      yes but i'll admit those aren't my strongest moments

5.5.24  10:22 am   Whats your favorite video that you have made?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

5.5.24  7:38 am   what can i do to shut my mind up

      feel something

5.5.24  4:38 am   why did you misspell qeustions with ueqstions

      that's "questions". you are supposed to read the colored letters first

5.5.24  1:16 am   The ending of la de da de da de da de day oh is very strange and one of my favorite parts of the song. The rest was fun to transcribe and I feel it taught me a lot.  But the ending feels like the song turned upside down.

     that's true

     The song abandons any sort of recognizably melody or harmony except for the quick chords on "oh no" and even those seem to have no relation to the key of G (in fact it even sounds like they purposely clash with it),

     all true

      on top of the the lyrics seems to contradict some of what you said in the song.

     also true

      Why did you choose such a sudden and backwards ending?

     being in a song, and being out of a song, are 2 drastically different worlds. regardless of whether a song has a shocking ending, it's still a very shocking transition to go from listening to a song to not listening to a song. so it often feels appropriate to incorporate elements of this shocking transition, into the song itself. for example: a door usually looks much different from the space in the room

      And if possible could tell me what the chords on "oh no" are and why you chose them. They're the only part of the song I'm not totally sure I transcribed correctly.

     it's this

      I love the ending so much and I want to understand it more.

      in that case, that's exactly the reason i made it that way. if you've ever done something that someone else loves, i'm sure you know this feeling precisely

5.5.24  12:41 am   If my car breaks stop working can I just pop that bad boy in reverse and floor it?

      i think you'd break something, but i don't think the car will let you do that anyway

5.5.24  12:10 am   Could you list at least five things that you think are otherworldly?

      sure. in this case, it would be the numbers 6 through 10

5.4.24  8:43 pm   Can ideas be any size?

      yes, they can be even more sizes than actual things

5.4.24  6:29 pm   What are the differences between theory and practice in theory and in practice?

      none. they are all the same

5.4.24  5:52 pm   have you ever unbaked a pie

      lord knows i've tried

5.4.24  5:28 pm   what is your favorite part about the dewey decimal system

      the name. that's because that's the only thing i know about it

5.4.24  3:45 pm   what is the biggest whole number factorial you can count to

      4!, i assume 5! is just infinity

5.4.24  3:07 pm   What's a song that you think has a really strong opening line? Excluding songs that start with an instrumental intro, just a song that you press play and... Wham! Punched in the face with the opening lyric.

      wah, i feel good

5.4.24  1:56 pm   how do you make your visuals so colorful?

      it's the usage of greys

5.4.24  12:30 pm   how do i make a successful movie?

      just make a movie. this of course is also how you make an unsuccessful movie. the method is the same in that regard

5.4.24  9:08 am   do you feel constrained by language, or thoughts?

      not really. they are an opportunity

5.4.24  4:08 am   What's the difference between things and stuff?

      things is a plural noun, stuff is a stuff noun. you can see the difference by trying to count them: you can use numbers to count things. 3 things, 4 things. but you can't do that with 'stuff'. you can measure and weigh it, but you'll need to specify the unit of measurement

5.4.24  2:02 am   How often on a daily basis do you think about the Roman Empire?

      .03

5.4.24  1:54 am   have people said youre funny and would you agree

      everything is funny. that's not my fault

5.3.24  11:44 pm   what is your favourite colour?

      grey

5.3.24  9:33 pm   Opinions on the word "onomatopoeia"?

      it sounds just like it sounds to say it, when you say it

5.3.24  9:08 pm   Whats your favorite word?

      qwerty

5.3.24  7:10 pm   i visited new caanan a few weeks ago (i'm from the uk) and it's very nice! thanks for the recommendation and the song, both very pretty. oh that's not a question.. uhh did you really play the bass on that track?

      i played everything on it

5.3.24  5:40 pm   What Beatles song would make the best name for a child (will also accept solo works)

      doctor robert

5.3.24  5:27 pm   what are your thoughts on the chord Cadd4, voiced C F E G lowest to highest

      could happen

5.3.24  4:37 pm   am i a parrot?

      no

5.3.24  4:21 pm   why do i like to self sabotage? it's getting very annoying

      you actually don't like it

5.3.24  2:29 pm   how to play counterpoint on piano?

      i've never heard the word counterpoint used at the same time as what it means. so therefore i've never actually figured out what the word means

5.3.24  1:35 pm   do you have a hard time figuring out other peoples left and right.

     no

     like, sometimes I'll look at someone and think, "oh they're left handed" and then I have to imagine myself as them in their perspective and then I realize that it is in fact, their right hand.

5.3.24  1:35 pm   thoughts on the number 23?

      best number to multiply by 88! (for 2024)

5.3.24  1:21 pm   ideal fish and chip shop order

      fish, then chips

5.3.24  12:48 pm   Do you think about numbers a lot?

      yes but sometimes i think about words instead

5.3.24  12:28 pm   Surrealism or Cubism?

      they've merged, into something that can only be described as 'tepid'

5.3.24  11:25 am   i like to wear soft clothing because it feels nice. am i doing it wrong?

      no

5.3.24  10:44 am   What's your opinion on your favorite martian

      at this point it's one of those vehicles

5.3.24  10:23 am   if my dog uses his paws to grab things then am i allowed to use my mouth

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

5.3.24  7:38 am   What's the most aerodynamic number?

      ∞

5.3.24  7:35 am   Why is the page called questions when there's answers here?

      because questions lead to answers

5.3.24  3:08 am   How do you make your videos?

      instead of having a beginning middle and end, i skip the middle and go straight from the beginning to the end

5.3.24  2:08 am   what do you tend to laugh about most often

      facts

5.3.24  2:05 am   do you think the word uncanny is uncanny

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes
